title: Pulsed electric field effect on acrylamide reduction and quality attributes of continuous-style Lamoka potato chips

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Priscila Santiago-Mora, Mark Skinner, Alyssa Hendricks, Tauras Rimkus, Brian Meyer, Jim Gratzek, Shin Pu, Luke Woodbury, Laura Bond, Owen McDougal
